commands.config.collision_destroy.beastl: Enabled vehicle collision destroy blocks (Beastly Mode)
commands.config.collision_destroy.hard: Enabled vehicle collision destroy blocks (Hard Mode)
commands.config.collision_destroy.normal: Enabled vehicle collision destroy blocks (Normal Mode)
commands.config.collision_destroy.soft: Enabled vehicle collision destroy blocks (Soft Mode)
config.superbwarfare.client.control.inve: Set TRUE to invert aircraft control
config.superbwarfare.client.control.mous: Adjust mouse sensitivity while holding a gun
config.superbwarfare.client.display.adva: Display advanced ammo information in the lower right corner when turned on
config.superbwarfare.client.display.ammo: Display firearm and ammo information in the lower right corner when turned on
config.superbwarfare.client.display.armo: Display the durability of the bulletproof insert currently equipped on the chest armor in the lower left corner when turned on
config.superbwarfare.client.display.came: Slightly shaky view when holding a firearm in your hand
config.superbwarfare.client.display.dog_: Whether to display the icon of dog tag in kill messages
Whether to display the name of dog tag in kill messages
config.superbwarfare.client.display.enab: Whether to enable gun lod in third person view
Whether to display heat bar HUD
config.superbwarfare.client.display.expl: The strength of the screen shake caused by explosions
config.superbwarfare.client.display.floa: The cross hair will follow the viewpoint to a certain extent when turned on
config.superbwarfare.client.display.heat: The horizontal offset of heat bar HUD
The vertical offset of heat bar HUD
config.superbwarfare.client.display.kill: The kill indicator will appear around the cross hair after a creature is killed when turned on
config.superbwarfare.client.display.shoc: The strength of the screen shake caused by shock effect
config.superbwarfare.client.display.stam: Display Stamina HUD when tactical sprinting or holding breath
config.superbwarfare.client.display.vehi: Whether to display vehicle info when aiming at a vehicle
config.superbwarfare.client.display.weap: The horizontal offset of weapon HUD
The vertical offset of weapon HUD
The strength of the screen shake caused by weapons
config.superbwarfare.client.kill_message: The kill indicator will appear around the collimator after a creature is killed when turned on
The horizontal offset of kill message
The vertical offset of kill message
The base position of kill message
Display killing message in the upper right corner when turned on
config.superbwarfare.client.reload.left_: Tap the fire button to reload when the current clip is empty
config.superbwarfare.common.gameplay.glo: Whether to show a kill indication around the cross hair when killing a creature with only the damage type of this module
config.superbwarfare.common.gameplay.res: Whether to refill your armor plate after respawning automatically
Whether to reload all weapons in the inventory after respawning automatically
config.superbwarfare.title: SuperbWarfare: Config
death.attack.air_crash.entity: %1$s was killed in the air by %2$s
death.attack.air_crash.item: %1$s was killed in the air by %2$s
death.attack.grapeshot_hit: %1$s found the grapeshot is very delicious
death.attack.grapeshot_hit.item: %1$s was filled with delicious grapeshot that %2$s bought with his %3$s
death.attack.laser_headshot.entity: %1$s's head was shot through by %2$s's laser
death.attack.lunge_mine: %1$s was blown up by lunge mine
death.attack.lunge_mine.entity: %1$s was blown up by %2$s's lunge mine
death.attack.lunge_mine.item: %1$s was blown up by %2$s's lunge mine using %3$s
death.attack.vehicle_strike: %1$s can't be trusted behind the wheel
des.superbwarfare.ammo_box: When sneaking, left-click to switch ammo types, right-click to store that type of ammo. Right-click with out sneaking to take out the corresponding type of ammo
des.superbwarfare.ap_bullet: Increased the armor-piercing ratio of bullets.
des.superbwarfare.artillery_indicator.ad: %1$s has been added to the artillery array
des.superbwarfare.artillery_indicator.fa: %1$s's type is not compatible with the artillery array
des.superbwarfare.artillery_indicator.fu: The artillery array is full, no more artillery can be added
des.superbwarfare.artillery_indicator.re: %1$s has been removed from the artillery array
des.superbwarfare.artillery_indicator_1: Right-click on artillery or intelligent mortar while sneaking to add to the artillery array
des.superbwarfare.artillery_indicator_2: Right-click again to remove from the artillery array
des.superbwarfare.artillery_indicator_3: Right-click to zoom, scroll wheel to adjust zoom ratio, middle mouse button to mark target location
des.superbwarfare.artillery_indicator_4: Hold left mouse button to send fire command
des.superbwarfare.artillery_indicator_5: When in off-hand: use drone to mark locations (same controls as above)
des.superbwarfare.aurelia_sceptre_1: The ethereal fae, pearl-covered sceptre spans the universe
des.superbwarfare.aurelia_sceptre_2: "It is the cerulean ocean's lament, the lunar weeping on shores, the laughter crystallized amidst the crimson barrage"
des.superbwarfare.beast_bullet: Ignore obstacles, Increase criteria area, Kill every living entity.
des.superbwarfare.blade_bullet: Causes a target to start bleeding after being hit.
des.superbwarfare.bread_bullet: Deals extreme knockback and slowness to stuck mobs.
des.superbwarfare.butterfly_bullet: Replace fired bullets with Rain Shower Butterflies.
des.superbwarfare.charging_station: Charge nearby entities and adjacent blocks
des.superbwarfare.creative_ammo_box: Provide infinite ammo when placed in inventory
des.superbwarfare.creative_charging_stat: Charge nearby entities and adjacent blocks, can also be used as a power source item
Successfully cleared energy from this item!
des.superbwarfare.creative_superb_item_i: A fast omnidirectional hopper for transferring unlimited items to targeted entities
des.superbwarfare.crowbar: Right-click to open containers. Pick up vehicles when sneaking
des.superbwarfare.cupid_arrow: Make the target fall in love after being hit. Deals no damage to living entities.
des.superbwarfare.curse_flame_bullet: Adds a curse flame affect on the target after hitting.
des.superbwarfare.desperado: Reload after a headshot-kill will increase rate of fire.
des.superbwarfare.developing: This item is still under development
des.superbwarfare.electric_baton: Right click while sneaking to switch electroshock mode
des.superbwarfare.fair_means: First hit causes partial damage, second hit causes high damage
des.superbwarfare.field_doctor: Bullets will heal allies whilst firing from the hip.
des.superbwarfare.firefly: Precision kills cause the target to explode with fire.
des.superbwarfare.fourth_times_charm: Rapidly landing precision hits will return two rounds to the magazine.
des.superbwarfare.guns.edit: Press %1$s key to open Edit Screen
des.superbwarfare.head_seeker: Body shots landed with this weapon increase headshot damage for a short time.
des.superbwarfare.heal_clip: Reloading after defeating a mob will heal you and your nearby allies.
des.superbwarfare.iff_1: When player joins a vanilla team and team ID is not 'TDM', teammate indicator will display onscreen
des.superbwarfare.intelligent_chip: Aims at enemies automatically (Do not use this in PVP mode)
des.superbwarfare.jhp_bullet: Increases damage against unarmored targets, but the damage decreases rapidly as the armor value rises.
des.superbwarfare.kill_clip: Increases the damage of weapon after dealing a final blow.
des.superbwarfare.killing_tally: Kills increase the weapon's damage until it is stowed or reloaded.
des.superbwarfare.longer_wire: Increases the range of the Taser's projectiles.
des.superbwarfare.magnificent_howl: The number of precision final blows before reloading affects the total rounds granted with increased damage.
des.superbwarfare.medical_kit: Right-click while sneaking to throw it, hold right mouse button to heal when health is not full
des.superbwarfare.micro_missile: Fires a high-speed projectile without gravity.
des.superbwarfare.mortar_deployer: While sneaking, right-click mortar with Monitor to convert it to intelligent mortar
des.superbwarfare.phase_penetrating_bull: Allows bullets to penetrate any block.
des.superbwarfare.poisonous_bullet: Makes the target poison after landing a hit.
des.superbwarfare.powerful_attraction: Experience and items dropped by slain mobs will instantly be transferred to your inventory.
des.superbwarfare.regeneration: Energy weapons will restore energy automatically.
des.superbwarfare.riot_bullet: Adds slowness and weakness on the target after hitting, deals extra damage to illager entities.
des.superbwarfare.secondary_cataclysm_1: "Like the remnants after a shower of stars fall"
des.superbwarfare.shortcut_pack_2: Synthesize firearms and shortcut kits at the anvil for one upgrade point
des.superbwarfare.silver_bullet: Deals extra damage to undead entities.
des.superbwarfare.subsistence: Defeating mobs will partially reload your weapon's magazine.
des.superbwarfare.superb_item_interface: A fast omnidirectional hopper for transferring items to targeted entities
des.superbwarfare.trachelium_2: "May the flowers in my hand convey my feelings to you"
des.superbwarfare.turbo_charger: Reduces wind-up time for compatible weapons
des.superbwarfare.vehicle_assembly_table: Used to make vehicles, requires a 2 x 2 x 2 space to be placed
des.superbwarfare.vehicle_damage_analyze: Right-click a vehicle to start tracking its damage situation, right-click again to stop tracking
des.superbwarfare.vehicle_deployer: Right click with a container to set vehicle info. Summon a vehicle when triggered
des.superbwarfare.volt_overload: Increases shock damage of Taser Gun
info.superbwarfare.a_10a: The A-10 Attack Aircraft is a single-seat, twin-engine attack plane designed specifically for ground attack missions. It delivers overwhelming firepower against enemy tanks, armored vehicles, and critical ground targets.
info.superbwarfare.ah_6: The AH-6 Little Bird is a light attack helicopter accommodating 4 crew members. It is armed with a 20mm autocannon and 70mm rockets, capable of harassing and destroying enemy infantry and light armored units.
info.superbwarfare.annihilator: The Annihilator Energy Cannon is a triple-barreled device that fires devastating high-energy lasers. Each shot consumes a massive amount of energy.
info.superbwarfare.bl_132: The 130mm BL-132 naval gun featured a quadruple enclosed mount. Its distinctive turret design enabled exceptional firepower projection capabilities, providing medium-to-long range saturation bombardment and anti-air support.
info.superbwarfare.bmp_2: The BMP-2 is a tracked infantry fighting vehicle equipped with a 30mm autocannon, a 7.62mm machine gun, and wire-guided anti-tank missiles. It accommodates 7 crew members and has fording capability.
info.superbwarfare.hpj_11: The HPJ-11 is a Close-In Weapon System (CIWS) featuring an 11-barrel 30mm Gatling-style rapid-fire cannon that fires 30mm small-caliber shells.
info.superbwarfare.laser_tower: This compact, energy-efficient, and environmentally friendly laser defense device is the ideal choice for keeping zombies out of your backyard.
info.superbwarfare.lav_150: The LAV-150 is a light wheeled infantry fighting vehicle equipped with a 20mm autocannon and a 7.62mm machine gun. It accommodates 5 crew members and has fording capability.
info.superbwarfare.mk_42: The MK 42 5-inch/54-caliber gun is a single enclosed mount. Its exceptional rate of fire enables potent firepower projection capabilities, providing precision fire support against surface targets and anti-air support at medium-to-long ranges.
info.superbwarfare.mle_1934: The 138.6mm Mle 1934 naval gun featured a twin enclosed mount. Its relatively large caliber delivered enhanced terminal effect, providing medium-to-long range naval gunfire support.
info.superbwarfare.prism_tank: The Prism Tank is a specialized tank capable of firing high-energy lasers at enemies. It accommodates 2 crew members and lacks fording capability.
info.superbwarfare.speedboat: The Speedboat is a light vessel armed with a .50 CAL heavy machine gun. It accommodates 5 crew members and achieves high speeds on water.
info.superbwarfare.tom_6: The Tom F6F is a 'fixed-wing aircraft' from the cartoon Tom and Jerry. It seats one pilot and carries a single devastating Watermelon Bomb.
info.superbwarfare.type_63: The Type 63 is a multiple rocket launcher with 12 launch tubes for 107mm rockets, capable of firing various types of ammunition. It's hailed as the most suitable 'heavy weapon' for guerrilla warfare.
info.superbwarfare.waveforce_tower: The Wave-Force Tower is an advanced base defense structure for the Empire of the Rising Sun in Red Alert 3. This stationary turret eliminates ground threats with superheated energy barrages.
info.superbwarfare.yx_100: The YX-100 Main Battle Tank is equipped with a large-caliber electromagnetic acceleration cannon, along with a heavy machine gun and kamikaze swarm drones operated by two additional crew members. It lacks fording capability.
item.superbwarfare.medium_rocket_cm: Medium Caliber HE Cluster Munitions Rocket
jei.superbwarfare.ancient_cpu: Mysterious ancient technology, can be found at ancient cities.
jei.superbwarfare.charging_station: Generates power by consuming fuel or food, and can also accept FE energy input. This block supplies FE energy to adjacent blocks, and can also charge rechargeable vehicles within range.
superbwarfare.advancement.main.ancient_t: Find a mysterious ancient technology in the ancient city
superbwarfare.advancement.main.best_frie: Maybe it shouldn't be your friend...
superbwarfare.advancement.main.blueprint: Welcome to the era of firearms
superbwarfare.advancement.main.boomstick: Who said RPGs can't be baseball bats?
superbwarfare.advancement.main.clean_ene: Make a charging station to charge your vehicles and batteries
superbwarfare.advancement.main.hammer.de: Make a hammer to smash minerals into dust
superbwarfare.advancement.main.physics_e: Make a crowbar to crack open containers
superbwarfare.advancement.main.rush_rush: The electric baton has to be paired with a wheelchair to deal damage, making it look as weak as a terminal superb soldier.
superbwarfare.book.superb_warfare_manual: A tutorial on Superb Warfare mod, teaching you how to become a superb soldier (WIP)
superbwarfare.category.misc.des: Understand how to use Superb Warfare's misc items
superbwarfare.category.perk.des: Understand the function of Superb Warfare's perks
superbwarfare.category.resources.des: Understand how to get Superb Warfare's resources
superbwarfare.category.vehicle.des: Understand how to drive Superb Warfare's vehicles
superbwarfare.category.weapon.des: Understand how to use Superb Warfare's weapons
superbwarfare.page.misc.aircraft_catapul: $(item)Aircraft Catapult$() transports entities standing on it. Direction depends on the arrow orientation on the block.$(p)Requires redstone signal to activate. Higher signal strength increases transport speed.$(p)$(l)Redstone signal must be applied at the front end of the entire device!$()
superbwarfare.page.misc.barbed_wire.1: $(item)Barbed Wire$() slows entities like cobwebs while dealing continuous damage.
superbwarfare.page.misc.drone.1: Deploy $(item)Drone$() and bind it with a $(thing)Monitor$(). When bound (Monitor lights up), $(thing)right-click$() to enter drone view.$(p)Drones have 5 durability. High-speed collisions reduce durability; 0 durability causes explosion.$(br)Disconnects when too far from player.
superbwarfare.page.misc.drone.2: $(l)Drone Controls:$()$(p)$(thing)$(k:key.use)$() - Enter/Exit View$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.forward) / $(k:key.back)$() - Move Forward/Backward$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.left) / $(k:key.right)$() - Move Left/Right$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.jump)$() - Ascend$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.sneak)$() - Descend$(br)$(thing)Mouse Wheel Scroll$() - Zoom$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.interact)$() - Interact/Attack$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.fire)$() - Drop Payload/Self-Destruct
superbwarfare.page.misc.drone.3: Load drones with items like $(item)RGO Grenade$() or $(item)Mortar Shell$() (configurable via datapacks). Press $(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.fire)$() to deploy payload or self-destruct.
superbwarfare.page.misc.fumo_25.1: $(item)FuMO25 Fire Control Radar$() scans nearby entities.$(p)$(thing)Left-click$() blips on the scanner to display entity positions/names. Insert $(thing)Firing Parameters$() on the right and press button to record locations.
superbwarfare.page.misc.fumo_25.2: The default is $(thing)Normal Mode$(). Buttons toggle:$(br)$(l)Wider Mode:$() Expands scan range.$(br)$(l)Alert Mode:$() Highlights entities.$(br)$(l)Guidance Mode:$()) After selecting entities, guides owned defense towers to attack targets within range.$(p)
superbwarfare.page.misc.jump_pad.1: Launches players/entities (including all vehicles in Superb Warfare) when stepped on.$(p)Press $(thing)$(k:key.jump)$() in air for a directional dash toward your viewpoint.
superbwarfare.page.misc.jump_pad.2: Approaching while $(thing)sneaking$() launches players toward their facing direction.
superbwarfare.page.misc.superb_item_inte: $(item)Superb Item Interface$() rapidly transfers items to entities. Transfer direction depends on placement, with arrows indicating flow. Use a $(thing)Crowbar$() to change its direction.$(p)Entities facing the transfer direction can receive items from its 5-slot inventory.
$(item)Target Deployer$() tests player damage, displaying caused damage and distance in chat.$(p)Downed after 40 damage, becoming invulnerable before auto-resetting.$(p)Right-click when empty-handed to rotate it. Sneak and right-click to retrieve.
$(item)DPS Generator$() is a special target converting damage to FE.$(p)When downed, its $(item)Level$() increases, doubling effective HP and boosting FE output.
$(o)"Have you tried doing more damage per second?"$()
superbwarfare.page.perk.ap_bullet.1: $(l)Damage: $()-10%%$(br)$(l)Velocity: $()+20%%$(br)$(l)Armor Piercing: $()+(35 + 5 x $(thing)Perk Level$())%%$(br)Converts shotguns to fire slugs$(br)$(l)Bullet Color: $()$(#E64623)#E64623$()
superbwarfare.page.perk.jhp_bullet.1: $(l)Damage: $()+10%%$(br)$(l)Velocity: $()-5%%$(br)$(l)Armor Piercing: $()-20%%$(br)Converts shotguns to fire slugs$(br)$(l)Bullet Color: $()$(#E68341)#E68341$()$(br)$(l)Effect: $()Deals bonus damage scaling inversely with target's armor upon hitting entities.
$(item)Gun Reforge Table$() allows adding perks for guns in Superb Warfare to enhance their strength. $(p)Every gun can be added 3 types of perks: $(thing)Ammo Perk$(), $(thing)Functional Perk$() and $(thing)Damage Perk$().

Guns possess $(thing)Level$() and $(thing)Upgrade Points$(). Shooting or killing living entities grants experience. For every 2 levels gained, 1 Upgrade Point is obtained. Upgrade Points are used to upgrade $(thing)Perks$(). The max level of each perk is 20.
Combine a $(thing)Gun$() with a $(item)Shortcut Pack$() on an anvil to gain 1 Upgrade Point. $(p)$(o)Too Expensive!$()
superbwarfare.page.resources.galena.1: $(thing)Galena Ore$() is generated in the overworld $(thing)from Y=36 to Y=1$().
superbwarfare.page.resources.galena.2: $(thing)Deepslate Galena Ore$() is generated in the overworld $(thing)from Y=0 to Y=-64$().
superbwarfare.page.resources.scheelite.1: $(thing)Scheelite Ore$() is generated in the overworld $(thing)from Y=48 to Y=1$().
superbwarfare.page.resources.scheelite.2: $(thing)Deepslate Scheelite Ore() is generated in the overworld $(thing)from Y=0 to Y=-64$().
superbwarfare.page.resources.scheelite.3: $(thing)Tungsten Ingot$() can only be blasted by $(thing)Blast Furnace$().
superbwarfare.page.resources.silver.1: $(thing)Silver Ore$() is generated in the overworld $(thing)from Y=48 to Y=1$().
superbwarfare.page.resources.silver.2: $(thing)Deepslate Silver Ore() is generated in the overworld $(thing)from Y=0 to Y=-64$().
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.a_10a.1: $(thing)A-10A Thunderbolt II$() is a single seat attacker with medium armor protection. Carries 4 flare countermeasures to disrupt guided targeting, automatically replenishing flares one by one over time.$(p)Press $(thing)$(k:key.jump)$() to operate landing gears, $(thing)$(k:key.sneak)$() to open speed brake, $(thing)$(k:key.sprint)$() to enable boost.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.a_10a.2: $(l)Basic Attributes: $()$(p)Durability - 350$(br)Max Passengers - 1$(br)Climbing Height - 0.5m$(br)Max Energy - 1,000,000FE$(br)Energy Cost - 256FE/tick$(br)Max Speed - 180km/h (No boost) / 300km/h (Boost)
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.a_10a.3: $(l)Weapon Attributes: $()$(p)Position 1: $(p)(1) 30mm Cannon$(br)Fire Rate - 1200RPM$(br)Direct Damage - 30$(br)Explosion Damage - 10$(br)Explosion Radius - 4m$(br)Ammo - $(item)Small Caliber Shells$()$(br)(2) Small Caliber Rocket$(br)Fire Rate - 120RPM$(br)Direct Damage - 90$(br)Explosion Damage - 50$(br)Explosion Radius - 6m$(br)Ammo - $(item)Small Caliber Rocket$()
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.a_10a.4: (3) MK-82 Aerial Bomb$(br)Explosion Damage - 650$(br)Explosion Radius - 11m$(br)Ammo - $(item)Medium Aerial Bomb$()$(br)(4) AGM-65 Air-to-ground Missile$(br)Direct Damage - 1100$(br)Explosion Damage - 150$(br)Explosion Radius - 9m$(br)Ammo - $(item)Air-to-ground Missile$()
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.ah_6.1: $(thing)AH-6 Little Bird$() is a light helicopter carrying 4 crew members, with weak armor protection. Carries 4 flare countermeasures to disrupt guided targeting, automatically replenishing flares one by one over time.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.ah_6.3: $(l)Weapon Attributes: $()$(p)Position 1: $(p)(1) 20mm Cannon$(br)Fire Rate - 500RPM$(br)Direct Damage - 25$(br)Explosion Damage - 13$(br)Explosion Radius - 4m$(br)Ammo - $(item)Small Caliber Shells$()$(br)(2) Small Caliber Rocket$(br)Direct Damage - 80$(br)Explosion Damage - 40$(br)Explosion Radius - 5m$(br)Ammo - $(item)Small Caliber Rocket$()
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.bmp_2.1: $(thing)BMP-2$() is a tracked IFV carrying 7 crew members, featuring good armor protection and amphibious capabilities.$(p)Equipped with smoke generators to disrupt guided targeting, automatically replenishing smoke grenades periodically.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.bmp_2.2: $(l)Basic Attributes: $()$(p)Durability - 300$(br)Max Passengers - 7$(br)Climbing Height - 2.25m$(br)Max Energy - 5,000,000FE$(br)Energy Cost - 64FE/tick$(br)Enclosed Vehicle
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.bmp_2.3: $(l)Weapon Attributes: $()$(p)Position 1: $(p)(1) 30mm Cannon$(br)Fire Rate - 250RPM$(br)Damage - 55$(br)Ammo - $(item)Small Caliber Shells$()$(br)(2) 7.62mm Machine Gun$(br)Fire Rate - 750RPM$(br)Damage - 9.5$(br)Ammo - $(item)Rifle Ammo$()$(br)(3) 9M113 Missile Launcher$(br)Direct Damage - 700$(br)Explosion Damage - 60$(br)Explosion Radius - 6m$(br)Ammo - $(item)Wire Guide Missile$()
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.control.1: $(o)"A driver must know how to drive!"$()$(br)--The Author$(p)This chapter introduces vehicle controls in Superb Warfare, helping you understand how to control vehicles.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.control.2: $(l)Basic Controls: $()$(p)$(thing)$(k:key.use)$() - Enter vehicle$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.dismount)$() - Dismount (Double-tap to dismount from moving vehicles)$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.forward)$() - Forward$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.back)$() - Brake/Reverse$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.left) / $(k:key.right)$() - Steering/Roll$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.jump)$() - Brake$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.inventory)$() - Open vehicle inventory$(p)For vehicles with multiple seats: $(br)$(thing)$(k:key.sneak) + $(k:key.hotbar.1) ~ $(k:key.hotbar.9)$() - Switch Seats
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.control.3: $(l)Weapon Controls: $()$(p)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.fire)$() - Fire$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.hold_zoom) / $(k:key.superbwarfare.switch_zoom)$() - Zoom$(br)$(thing)Mouse Wheel / $(k:key.hotbar.1) ~ $(k:key.hotbar.9)$() - Switch Weapons$(p)Available functions for certain vehicles: $(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.release_decoy)$() - Release decoy/smoke$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.free_camera)$() - Toggle free camera$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.jump)$() - Drop bombs
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.intro.1: The vehicles in Superb Warfare are stored in $(item)Containers$() and need to be opened by a $(item)Crowbar$().$(p)Opening a container requires sufficient space. You can check the required space by aiming at the container when holding a crowbar.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.intro.2: $(thing)Sneak and Right-Click$() an empty vehicle with a crowbar, you can store it into a container.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.intro.3: Vehicles can be crafted in $(item)Vehicle Assembling Table$(), which needs 2 x 2 x 2 space for placement. $(p)Right click it to open GUI, select and craft the vehicle if there are enough materials in the inventory.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.intro.5: Most of the vehicles need energy, you can charge them by $(item)Charging Station$().$(p)Right Click the Charging Station to open the GUI, charge it by putting $(thing)Fuels or Foods$() in the left grid. The Charging Station will automatically charge all vehicles in the range, and the right grid can be used to charge items.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.intro.6: The Charging Station can also receive $(thing)FE$() from other mods.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.lav_150.1: $(thing)LAV-150$() is a light wheeled IFV carrying 5 crew members, featuring basic armor protection and amphibious capabilities.$(p)Equipped with smoke generators to disrupt guided targeting, automatically replenishing smoke grenades periodically.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.lav_150.2: $(l)Basic Attributes: $()$(p)Durability - 250$(br)Max Passengers - 5$(br)Climbing Height - 1.5m$(br)Max Energy - 5,000,000FE$(br)Energy Cost - 64FE/tick$(br)Enclosed Vehicle
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.lav_150.3: $(l)Weapon Attributes: $()$(p)Position 1: $(p)(1) 20mm Cannon$(br)Fire Rate - 300RPM$(br)Damage - 45$(br)Ammo - $(item)Small Caliber Shells$()$(br)(2) 7.62mm Machine Gun$(br)Fire Rate - 600RPM$(br)Damage - 9.5$(br)Ammo - $(item)Rifle Ammo$()
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.prism_tank.1: $(thing)Prism Tank$() is a special-purpose tank carrying 2 crew members, featuring excellent armor protection but no amphibious capabilities.$(p)Equipped with smoke generators to disrupt guided targeting, automatically replenishing smoke grenades periodically.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.prism_tank.2: $(l)Basic Attributes: $()$(p)Durability - 400$(br)Max Passengers - 2$(br)Climbing Height - 2.25m$(br)Max Energy - 20,000,000FE$(br)Energy Cost - 96FE/tick$(br)Enclosed Vehicle (Position 1)
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.prism_tank.3: $(l)Weapon Attributes: $()$(p)Position 1: $(p)(1) Laser Cannon$(br)Fire Rate - 30RPM$(br)Damage - 350$(br)Splash Damage - 72$(br)Splash Radius - 4m$(br)Energy Cost - 100,000FE$(br)(2) Laser$(br)Damage - 15$(br)Energy Cost - 5,000FE/tick
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.speedboat.1: $(thing)Speedboat$() is a light vessel carrying 5 crew members, with weak armor protection.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.speedboat.3: $(l)Weapon Attributes: $()$(p)Position 1: $(p)(1) 12.7mm Heavy Machine Gun$(br)Fire Rate - 500RPM$(br)Damage - 25$(br)Ammo - $(item)Heavy Ammo$()
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.tom_6.1: $(thing)Tom F6F$() is extremely simple plane with weak armor protection. It can carry a $(thing)Melon$() as weapon.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.wheel_chair.1: $(thing)Wheelchair$() is a small vehicle with no armor protection.$(p)Repeat clicking $(thing)$(k:key.forward)$() to move forward when there is no energy.$(br)Hold $(thing)$(k:key.forward)$() to move forward rapidly when there is enough energy. Press $(thing)$(k:key.jump)$() to jump.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.yx_100.1: $(thing)YX-100$() is a main battle tank carrying 3 crew members, featuring powerful armor protection but no amphibious capabilities.$(p)Equipped with smoke generators to disrupt guided targeting, automatically replenishing smoke grenades periodically.
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.yx_100.2: $(l)Basic Attributes: $()$(p)Durability - 500$(br)Max Passengers - 3$(br)Climbing Height - 2.25m$(br)Max Energy - 20,000,000FE$(br)Energy Cost - 128FE/tick$(br)Enclosed Vehicle (Position 1/2)
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.yx_100.3: $(l)Weapon Attributes: $()$(br)Position 1: $(br)(1)  Large-caliber Railgun$(br)Fire Rate - 15RPM$(br)Direct Damage - 500$(br)Explosion Damage - 100$(br)Explosion Radius - 4m$(br)Ammo - $(item)AP Shell$()$(br)(2)  Large-caliber Railgun$(br)Fire Rate - 15RPM$(br)Direct Damage - 150$(br)Explosion Damage - 150$(br)Explosion Radius - 10m$(br)Ammo - $(item)HE Shell$()$(br)(3) 12.7mm Heavy Machine Gun$(br)Fire Rate - 500RPM$(br)Damage - 25$(br)Ammo - $(item)Heavy Ammo$()
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.yx_100.4: Position 2: $(p)(1) 12.7mm Heavy Machine Gun$(br)Fire Rate - 500RPM$(br)Damage - 25$(br)Ammo - $(item)Heavy Ammo$()
superbwarfare.page.vehicle.yx_100.5: Position 3: $(p)(1) Swarm Drone Launcher$(br)Fire Rate - 600RPM$(br)Explosion Damage - 80$(br)Explosion Radius - 5m$(br)Ammo - $(item)Swarm Drone$()
superbwarfare.page.weapon.control.1: This chapter introduces weapon controls in Superb Warfare.
superbwarfare.page.weapon.control.2: $(l)Basic Controls: $()$(p)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.fire)$() - Fire$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.hold_zoom) / $(k:key.superbwarfare.switch_zoom)$() - Aim$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.reload)$() - Reload$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.unload)$() - Unload Ammo$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.breath)$() - Hold Breath$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.sensitivity_increase)$() - Increase Sensitivity$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.sensitivity_reduce)$() - Decrease Sensitivity$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.fire_mode)$() - Switch Fire Mode$(p)For melee-capable weapons:$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.melee)$() - Melee
superbwarfare.page.weapon.control.3: $(l)Editing: $()$(p)For weapons that can be edited: $(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.edit_mode)$() - Open Edit Screen$(br)$(thing)$(k:key.superbwarfare.change_ammo_forward) / $(k:key.superbwarfare.change_ammo_backward)$() - Change Ammo Types
superbwarfare.page.weapon.intro.1: Most weapons in Superb Warfare require $(item)Blueprints$(), $(item)Material Packs$() of corresponding rarity, and $(thing)other materials$() for crafting.
superbwarfare.page.weapon.intro.2: This manual doesn't display complete forging recipes. Crafting $(item)weapons$() requires the weapon's corresponding $(item)Blueprint$() in addition to shown materials.
superbwarfare.page.weapon.intro.3: $(item)Blueprints$() can be found in various structure chests or purchased from $(thing)Armory$() villagers.
superbwarfare.page.weapon.intro.4: Weapons require ammo, categorized into two types: $(thing)Basic Ammo$() and $(thing)Item Ammo$().$(p)There are currently 5 basic ammo types: $(item)Handgun Ammo$(), $(item)Rifle Ammo$(), $(item)Sniper Ammo$(), $(item)Shotgun Shells$(), and $(item)Heavy Ammo$(). Right-click with ammo or ammo boxes to resupply.$(p)For weapons using item ammo, simply carry corresponding ammo items in your inventory.
superbwarfare.page.weapon.intro.5: $(item)Ammo Box$() can store $(thing)Basic Ammo$().$(p)When death drops are enabled, players carrying basic ammo drop a disposable ammo box upon death.
tips.superbwarfare.mount.onboard: Press %1$s to Dismount, Hold %1$s to Ejection
tips.superbwarfare.no_cloth_config: You have not installed Cloth Config API, cannot open the config interface
tips.superbwarfare.press_s_to_landing: Hold S to assist helicopter landing
tips.superbwarfare.vehicle_assembling_ta: No enough place to disassemble vehicle
